svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 2 2024
November 2 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 2, 2024" date: "2024-11-02"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #145): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well Mekong testnet : Pectra public
testnet live with devnet-4 spec Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec EIP7742 uncouple blob count between
CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee calculation but would be asymmetric if target increased to 4 with max 6 blobs per block
Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec Pectra-devnet-5 :
minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee
calculation but would be asymmetric if target increased to 4 with max 6 blobs per block Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made
in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well
Pectra-devnet-4 : testing going well
â€¢ Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec
Mekong testnet : Pectra public testnet live with devnet-4 spec
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec
Pectra-devnet-5 : minor spec changes merged, still finalizing spec
â€¢ EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee calculation but would be asymmetric if target
increased to 4 with max 6 blobs per block Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : agreed simple change to blob base fee calculation but would be asymmetric if target increased
to 4 with max 6 blobs per block
â€¢ Symmetric blob base fee adjustments could be made in Fusaka upgrade with PeerDAS
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Weekly testing call #11 : fusaka-devnet-0 with EOF still ~1 week away
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #11 : peerdas-devnet-3 died after a 100k slot reorg, peerdas-devnet-4 planned for end of November, will rebase on
Pectra
PeerDAS breakout #11 : peerdas-devnet-3 died after a 100k slot reorg, peerdas-devnet-4 planned for end of November, will rebase on Pectra
â€¢ EOF implementers call #61 : spec change discussions
EOF implementers call #61 : spec change discussions
Amsterdam upgrade
â€¢ Kaustinen-7 (Verkle testnet) live, use lodestar-quickstart to sync locally
Layer 1
â€¢ Terence: blob transactions in FOCIL (Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists) using execution layer blob pool
Terence: blob transactions in FOCIL (Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists) using execution layer blob pool
â€¢ GossipSub potential improvements for large message handling
GossipSub potential improvements for large message handling
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.8% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any
client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client scalability Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub
publishing & IDONTWANT usage
â€¢ Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client scalability
Nimbus v24.10.0 : improvements to sync & validator client scalability
â€¢ Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub publishing & IDONTWANT usage
Teku v24.10.3 : improvements to GossipSub publishing & IDONTWANT usage
For stakers
â€¢ Validator penalty simulator : visualize slashing & inactivity penalties on a single validator
Validator penalty simulator : visualize slashing & inactivity penalties on a single validator
â€¢ Rocket Pool Saturn 0 upgrade : 8 ETH mini pools with no RPL required
Rocket Pool Saturn 0 upgrade : 8 ETH mini pools with no RPL required
Layer 2
â€¢ Base fault proofs live, to become a stage 1 rollup final step is using a security council for upgrades
Base fault proofs live, to become a stage 1 rollup final step is using a security council for upgrades
â€¢ Blob burn simulator : visualize the impact of blob usage on ETH burn
Blob burn simulator : visualize the impact of blob usage on ETH burn
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7799 : System logs EIP7801 : eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential
update request EIP7805 : Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7799 : System logs
EIP7799 : System logs
â€¢ EIP7801 : eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol
EIP7801 : eth/70 - sharded blocks protocol
â€¢ EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential update request
EIP7804 : Withdrawal credential update request
â€¢ EIP7805 : Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
EIP7805 : Committee-based Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7798 : Tap to pay ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface ERC7803 : EIP712 extensions for account abstraction
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7798 : Tap to pay
ERC7798 : Tap to pay
â€¢ ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface
ERC7802 : Crosschain token interface
â€¢ ERC7803 : EIP712 extensions for account abstraction
ERC7803 : EIP712 extensions for account abstraction
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Argot collective : dev tools including Solidity & Sourcify spinning out of EF as a non-profit with 5-10 years of funding
Argot collective : dev tools including Solidity & Sourcify spinning out of EF as a non-profit with 5-10 years of funding
â€¢ Vyper (language) security : audit coverage for key parts of codebase & ABI decoder fuzzer
Vyper (language) security : audit coverage for key parts of codebase & ABI decoder fuzzer
â€¢ Tornado Cash (rebuilt) : Foundry project with latest versions of Circom & snarkJS, for educational purposes
Tornado Cash (rebuilt) : Foundry project with latest versions of Circom & snarkJS, for educational purposes
â€¢ Swiss knife contract diff : compare verified contracts across chains using Etherscan API v2
Swiss knife contract diff : compare verified contracts across chains using Etherscan API v2
â€¢ Based agent : create AI agent using Coinbase developer platform & OpenAI
Based agent : create AI agent using Coinbase developer platform & OpenAI
â€¢ CTF: Bank challenge : sequence of 5 Solidity challenges using Foundry
CTF:
â€¢ Bank challenge : sequence of 5 Solidity challenges using Foundry
Security
â€¢ Security Alliance (SEAL) wargames drill scenario template
Ecosystem
â€¢ More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap: Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge) : history expiry, state expiry and feature cleanup
Fix everything else (the Splurge) : EVM improvements, account abstraction, EIP1559 improvements, verifiable delay functions (VDFs) and
obfuscation + one-shot signatures
More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap:
â€¢ Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge) : history expiry, state expiry and feature cleanup
Reduce storage & complexity (the Purge) : history expiry, state expiry and feature cleanup
â€¢ Fix everything else (the Splurge) : EVM improvements, account abstraction, EIP1559 improvements, verifiable delay functions (VDFs) and
â€¢ Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Merge & the Surge
Evanâ€™s dumbing down of Vitalikâ€™s roadmap explainers: the Merge & the Surge
â€¢ ETHSydney hackathon projects
ETHSydney hackathon projects
Enterprise
â€¢ Shift4 enabling merchants to accept crypto , converted & settled in fiat, pilot Q4, rollout 2025
Shift4 enabling merchants to accept crypto , converted & settled in fiat, pilot Q4, rollout 2025
â€¢ UBS asset management launches tokenized investment fund
UBS asset management launches tokenized investment fund
Job Listings
â€¢ Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei 11.6k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 2.4 to 39.2 gwei, 8.8 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
â€¢ 11.6k ETH net issuance this week
11.6k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,434 - $2,720, currently $2,514, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,434 - $2,720, currently $2,514, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.036 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.036 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Synthetix proposal to acquire Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
Synthetix proposal to acquire Kwenta after spinning it out in 2020
â€¢ Limit Break wrapped native : updated WETH deployable on EVM chains with same address
Limit Break wrapped native : updated WETH deployable on EVM chains with same address
â€¢ Tee_hee_he : AI agent on X run in TEE
Tee_hee_he : AI agent on X run in TEE
â€¢ Wallet security ranking : mobile & browser wallets evaluated against a checklist
Wallet security ranking : mobile & browser wallets evaluated against a checklist
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Immutable received Wells notice from SEC
Immutable received Wells notice from SEC
â€¢ US Treasury: crypto & Treasury markets presentation , benefits/risks of tokenizing Treasuries
US Treasury: crypto & Treasury markets presentation , benefits/risks of tokenizing Treasuries
â€¢ Roman Storm trial moved to April
Roman Storm trial moved to April
â€¢ Temporary restraining order filed against Aragon for ANT redemption [Update: TRO application withdrawn]
Temporary restraining order filed against Aragon for ANT redemption [Update: TRO application withdrawn]
â€¢ Panama foundation vs Cayman-BVI explainer for token launches
Panama foundation vs Cayman-BVI explainer for token launches
â€¢ Layoffs: Consensys 20%, Kraken 15% & dYdX 35%
Layoffs: Consensys 20%, Kraken 15% & dYdX 35%
General
â€¢ Lottie player (JavaScript animation) supply chain attack injected wallet drainer 1inch amongst impacted projects
Lottie player (JavaScript animation) supply chain attack injected wallet drainer
â€¢ 1inch amongst impacted projects
â€¢ MrBeast onchain activity analyzed
MrBeast onchain activity analyzed
â€¢ M2 (UAE exchange) $13.7M stolen from hot wallets

END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
